name: Easy Crosswords - Pizzazz
description:
Wow! variety variety variety.....

Full of twist and endless fun with over 90 crossword for a dollar....

This is one and only "variety" crossword game is live in the store now.... play it and find the fun hidden. Crossword lovers and word game players will love this....

This wonderful crossword pack is a one and only crossword game loaded with full variety from shopping, home, garden, wildlife, seasons, colours, brain teasers and nature.

Wonderful list of crossword variety.... select and play any crossword from the 90+ list...

Extra answer grid boxes page for checking answers.

Search page for browsing the web while in game.

No ads.
